title: Foundation Kingdom Build Guard
description: Foundation Kingdom Build Guard is a casual simulation adventure game where you can mine, build, farm, and explore new lands. Collect materials from all over the medieval world and use them to restore justice and get rid of darkness. Don't forget that monsters attack you every night. Your medieval kingdom has been invaded by monsters. The whole world was covered in darkness. You have to free the medieval world and its inhabitants from terrible monsters and unravel the mystery of their appearance.
